channel.title: Need help with shops
channel.description:
I have the shop in autospawn. I have it in shops.cfg I have it in client.java.
But when i click trade i get dis connected??
What do i do!
Post your answer.
THANKKSS!
This is what it sais when i click treade it in my run server thing.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -21 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19396) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18091) at client.packetSending(client.java:18044) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player 1 s 1 t 1 r ClientHandler: Client 1 s 1 t 1 r disconnected.

item.title: Need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

  1. It’s items, not objects
  2. If decreasing the amount of items doesn’t work, put an try-catch, with an exception.printStackTrace(); to find out what exactly is causing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

Shops disconnect you when it has more ITEMS then the shop can allow cut down on the amount of objects you have in it and you will be able to trade him.

*Thanks for the update Zyle.

Read full topic
